scripts.main+add: npx mkdirp result & python ./util/pdnormalize.py && node main.js >> ./result/nlog.txt
scripts.O2+add: npx mkdirp result & gcc -O2 cdevice.c -lm && a.exe >> ./result/clog.txt
scripts.pyn+add: npx mkdirp result & python ./util/pdnormalize.py && python pyndevice.py >> ./result/plog.txt
scripts.formain+log: npx mkdirp result & python ./util/pdnormalize.py && python ./util/slicebatch.py && node formain.js > ./result/nbatch.log & "C:\Program Files (x86)\Hidemaru\Hidemaru.exe" /je ./result/nbatch.log
scripts.forpy+log: npx mkdirp result & python ./util/pdnormalize.py && python ./util/slicebatch.py && python forpyndevice.py > ./result/pbatch.log && python ./util/logclean.py
scripts.wincmd: if not exist result mkdir result
